title: blood moon diana
body: when yall gonna make blood moon diana , how was diana not the first person to get the blood moon skin. {{champion:131}}

replies.body:
Hey empressofthemoon, 

While I can't discuss if/when this will happen, I can tell you that the skins team is aware in the interest of a Blood Moon Diana skin! Keep in mind that although others have had Blood Moon skins before Diana, that doesn't mean she *couldn't* receive one in the future. We don't limit five champions (team comp) to a single thematic, which means there absolutely could be more Blood Moon skins (or other thematics) in the future.
Great news. If you see this, I was wondering, any news if there is any interest in a new Morgana skin?

> [{quoted}](name=arc95,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6MMKmBuK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-29T18:02:29.999+0000)
>
> Blood Moon {{champion:89}} Kappa

Nah
Eclipse Leona
